Class OfficerInterface

java.lang.Object
Interface.BaseInterface
Interface.OfficerInterface
public class OfficerInterface extends BaseInterface
OfficerInterface provides the command-line interface for users who are HDB officers. Officers can apply for projects, manage enquiries, book flats, handle applications, and view or register for projects. It supports both applicant and officer roles.

    Method
    Description
    void
    bookAFlat()
    Allows the officer to book a flat if their application has been approved.
    void
    editOrDeleteEnquiry()
    Displays the officer's past enquiries and allows editing or deletion if the enquiry has not been responded to yet.
    void
    registerForAProject()
    Allows the officer to register for a project they are eligible to manage.
    void
    replyToEnquiries()
    Displays enquiries directed at the officer's managed project and allows the officer to respond to them.
    void
    setApplicationsToBooked()
    Allows the officer to update an approved applicant's application status to "BOOKED" for the project they are managing.
    void

    Entry point for the OfficerInterface menu.

  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerInterface

      public OfficerInterface(User currentUser)
      Constructs an OfficerInterface with the current logged-in officer.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the currently authenticated user, expected to be an instance of HDBOfficer

  • Method Details

    • viewOrApplyProjects

      public void viewOrApplyProjects()
      Displays the list of available visible projects, allows the officer to filter them, apply for one, or manage project filters. Ensures an officer can only apply once.

    • viewMyProject

      public void viewMyProject()
      Displays the project that the officer has applied for, if any.

    • bookAFlat

      public void bookAFlat()
      Allows the officer to book a flat if their application has been approved.

    • withdrawApplication

      public void withdrawApplication()
      Allows the officer to request withdrawal of their submitted application.

    • submitAnEnquiry

      public void submitAnEnquiry()
      Allows the officer to submit an enquiry for a specific project, if eligible. Validates that the project exists and is visible to the officer.

    • editOrDeleteEnquiry

      public void editOrDeleteEnquiry()
      Displays the officer's past enquiries and allows editing or deletion if the enquiry has not been responded to yet.

    • registerForAProject

      public void registerForAProject()
      Allows the officer to register for a project they are eligible to manage. Validates project eligibility before submitting the registration.

    • viewMyRegistration

      public void viewMyRegistration()
      Displays the officer's submitted project registrations, if any.

    • viewMyManagingProject

      public void viewMyManagingProject()
      Displays the project that the officer is currently managing.

    • setApplicationsToBooked

      public void setApplicationsToBooked()
      Allows the officer to update an approved applicant's application status to "BOOKED" for the project they are managing.

    • replyToEnquiries

      public void replyToEnquiries()
      Displays enquiries directed at the officer's managed project and allows the officer to respond to them.

    • start

      public void start()
      Entry point for the OfficerInterface menu. Displays role-based options (applicant/officer) and routes user actions accordingly.
      Specified by:
      start in class BaseInterface
